Environmentekl-dev

Owned byQiao Han
Yiyu Ma
Platformkubernetes
1.29
Jenkinsekl-jenkins.ponyworld.io

#### EKL is a web application consisting of two components,
- ekl frontend -- is the Web UI of EKL which is available under [ekl-dev.ponyworld.io](https://ekl-dev.ponyworld.io) 
- ekl backend -- is based on Spring Boot and provides the Web Services of EKL.
